0.post_text:
Over the 12th - 15th January 2017 weekend, Performance Motors showcased the best of BMW Cars at the Singapore Motorshow 2017. 

We would like to thank all who came down to the BMW Booth and we hope you had a great time like we did! 

Visit us at Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6658 8051 to find out more on the existing deals.

5.post_text:
You can feel safer knowing that someone is watching out for you. 

Featuring the BMW Advanced Car Eye, a highly sensitive full-HD camera that reliably records any driving situation. Its split screen display, highly sensitive GPS receiver, park mode and external storage capabilities ensure a peace of mind always. 

What’s more, it matches perfectly inside any BMW Car. 

From now until 28th February 2017, enjoy great savings when you purchase the Original BMW Advanced Car Eye from Performance Motors. 

Front Camera only: SGD 688.00 with GST (usual price SGD 794.14)
Front and Rear Camera: SGD 808.00 with FST (usual price SGD 958.88)

Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 to book a test drive today. 

Other Programme cars include the adventurous BMW X5 along with the dynamic BMW 3 Series Gran Turismo.

*Terms and Conditions Apply.

14.post_text:
CHRISTMAS GIVEAWAY!
Are you geared up to reward yourself this Christmas?
Tag in the comments the person you would like to go on the roundtrip and tell us which BMW you would drive? Stand a chance to WIN a BMW Functional Rucksack! Contest closes on the 21st of December!
#BMW

comments.message:
Congratulations Joel Jan  for being selected as the winner for our Christmas Giveaway! You have won yourself the BMW Functional Rucksack! 

We would also like to congratulate our 5 runner-up winners, you have won yourself a BMW 7 Series Miniatures. 

Runner-up winners: 
1. Alex Ng 
2. Edmond Lim
3. Pauline Goh
4. Celine Yeo
5. Matthew Chua Boon Hou

I would like to bring Yvonne Chua S C to KL to visit our 70-year old mum in a BMW i8!! Then, I can drive my mum back to Singapore in this futuristic-looking car. It will be an awesome experience for her!!
I would like to take my family to a road trip in Malaysia. Party of 4. I love the X4. All X4s have an eight-speed automatic transmission and torque-vectoring all-wheel drive.
Would take an X3 on a road trip throughout peninsular Malaysia to discover less explored areas with my wife Serena Low.
I would love to go on a road trip with my lovely husband in his dreamcar - BMW X6 - the intelligent, agility and versatility of this beautiful mobile sports activity machine.

I would like to go on a road trip with anyone who wants to under the Club Rainbow scheme in a BMW X6M , so that both BWM and me could do our little part in making a little difference in that moment for that particular chronically ill child and their family members !

I would like to go on a road trip in the Scandinavian with my wifey Rachel Sin Li Choo and 2 daughters on the X5. Roughing it out on the terrain of the Scandinavian country side with this high performance machine.
It would be nice if I can go on a round trip with HL Chua in Taiwan on the BMW X5 xDrive40e, given it's fuel efficiency over long distances and roomy space for luggage.
BMW X6 will be perfect for us and the 3 kids esp the 2 boys -BMW (B)ryan, (M)arcus, (W)ee will be delighted. We love to go on a road trip!!

Ideally I would like to go for a round trip to Pulau Pinang with the missus in my BMW 5 series.  On the other hand, it would be hilarious if I could go a trip with Jeremy Clarkson and appeared in one of the episodes of the Grand Tour!  😆😆😆
I would like to go on a round trip with my best co-driver and partner in everything and soon to be Wife, Dina Goh, in a BMW X1!

Please grant my boyfriend, Kelvin Tan Loopinmotion and I a road trip on the M3, F80 because he really needs to feel the ///M performance, though NA, is way better than the other car make he's looking to change to in Mar'17 when his current 335i, N54 is up for scrap!
Perfect opportunity, let's hope this sways your mind darling.

Hello dear bmwers, love to do a round trip to Club Med Cherating Kuantan on BMW I8, it's innovative carbon chassis coupled electric motors and gasoline backups will the future of cars. Perfect for an eco retreat experience driving down the east coast of Malaysia! :)

Yay!! We just signed the deal for a BMW 2GT. Looking forward to hop in for a road trip with Ho Ks and 3 kiddos to Cameroon Highlands to experience the cool weather. And to let the little kids experience Christmas is on the Road! #BestMerryWonders #Kidstagram #wherelovetakesanadventure

Drove my 335i to Penang twice, so impressed to complete one way on one tank the first time! Impressed too of its speed. Now I would love to drive up again with my golfing kakis in a BMW 220d (if available) Grand Tourer for luggage space (golf clubs and all).

Gonna try this competition again.. judges didnt like my previous post so didnt win :(. 
I would like to go to genting highlands in a 3series cabriolet with my wife and 3yrold daughter.. with the wind in our hair.. and the cool breeze all ard.. sounds so fairytale just talking about it... not forgetting the 3series fuel economy plus BHP.. fwah... like tht say in old school.. "fierce ah"!!!!

Currently i am driving 3 series convertible. For a round trip, i am looking forward to have with me a X6 , so that my family members who travel with me can enjoy the intelligent, agility and versatility of this beautiful mobile sports activity machine.

I would love to go on a round trip with Sim Eak Bian in a BMW M6 Convertible to Kuala Lumpur for a short trip. Not only is the M6 a fast car, it also looks very beautiful, sure to attract attention in the Malaysian capital. It also will provide the driver with the pleasure and thrill of driving such an incredible car. The M6 Convertible is simply a masterpiece.

I would like to go on a road trip with my wife and 3 kids.. BMW X6 will be big enough for the whole family and the comfort and stability is one of the best.
Currently driving a 730Li, looking for a change soon..

I'd take my wife Gs Seow on a road trip in the i8. Awesome futuristic car with performance, luxury and great fuel economy which is great for road trips. Plus I'll probably get to park conveniently at the front of any hotel I check into with that car. #BMW
I would like to go on a road trip George Ngoh and my family. The BMW X6 is big enough for the whole family provides the  comfort and stability  that any road trip would need!

I would like to go on round trip with Jia Leng on BMW 320d Sedan EfficientDynamics Edition with BMW TwinPower Turbo 2 litre 4 cylinder diesel engine that delivers impressive fuel efficiency and have the power to reach 100 km/hour from a standstill in 7.9 seconds.
I would like to go on a roundtrip with my family and all my 3 kids , my lovely Wife Jaslyn Koh as the BMW X6 Veh Commander in the BMW X6 for to have an enjoyable and family bonding ride throught!

I would love to go on a roundtrip with Ngoh Poay Hoan on the BMW X1. 

We will need a comfortable safe and luxurious SUV to ensure that we don't tear each other apart ❤️❤️
I would love to go on a road trip with my wife Falak Amaar Khan to the Cameron Highlands in the new BMW X6 as it's the best vehicle in its class and would be a ride to remember.
Lim Tow Chong time to change

19.post_text:
CHRISTMAS GIVEAWAY!
Tell us in the comment where you would like to go on a road trip with your favorite BMW and why.
The most creative comment will walk away with a BMW Laptop Bag!
Contest closes on the 14th of December.
#BMW

comments.message:
Congratulations karl kok Ping Wee for being selected as the winner for our Christmas Giveaway! You have won yourself the BMW Laptop Bag! 

We would also like to congratulate our 5 runner-up winners, you have won yourself a BMW 7 Series Miniatures. 

Runner-up winners: 
1. Jun Xian L
2. Kenneth Goh
3. Clarence Lee
4. Ephren Cheong
5. Afiq Vava Voom

The ultimate road trip would be driving through the Historic Route 66, in my favourite the BMW F80 M3.  The legendary Route 66, immortalised in song, movies, books and a TV series.  Over two thousand miles all the way, cross country road trip that passes through all eight states from Chicago to Los Angeles. Earning it the title "Main Street of America" and "The Mother Road". What better way to see a marvelous cross section of American scenes and landscapes, from the cornfields of Illinois all the way to the golden sands and sunshine of Los Angeles, a slice of "Americana". No better choice to go on a two thousand plus miles road trip in a F80 M3, equal measure of style, performance, and glamour. So what are we waiting for? As the R&B anthem goes "get your kicks on Route 66!"
I would like to have breakfast at JB, lunch at KL and dinner back at Singapore with my i8 on Christmas Day

A cross Nordic trek on a x5m50d during winter. Driving through the beautiful scenery within the safety of a BMW regardless of weather conditions will be the best demonstration of the sheer driving pleasure and comfort for a family of 6.

I will drive my 216d GT to china via Malaysia, Thailand, and Vietnam with my friends driving other car brand such as Mercedes and Audi. They often said that my BMW is not the real BMW because of its front wheel drive, and it is inferior compared to their car. I will prove them wrong that my car will travel furthest with a full tank and lead in front of them. Sweet revenge is good.

driving the X3 to hat yat Thailand border would still be comfortable and the stability and safety of the car would withstand the bumpy roads up the malaysian roads at high speeds plus spacious enough to store all our luggage.
Driving my E46 to Genting highland n proof the ride with its power n fuel efficiency..best of all, digital music blast out along the smooth journey with beautiful scenary. 🎶🎶

I have been planing my ultimate road trip for a while. It is taking some time because I have to acquire the skills needed with the ultimate BMW machines I can find to suit the ultimate road trip that no one has attempted before. You see, my road trip consists of traveling to cities, off roads and dirt roads and I have line up my BMWs. The first will be the eco-friendly i3 where I will be driving through Kyushu area enjoying city drive around the area. Once I am out of the city i will switch to a M4 Convertible to enjoy the cool breeze going through expressways and coastal area all the way to Osaka. From Osaka I switch to the new BMW R9T Scrambler to ride through the winding roads around the mountain roads all the way to Mt Fuji. Finally I switch to the reliable X5 and drive it up via the 5th Station to the peak to watch the gorgeous sun rise with this ultimate and most reliable machine in the world!

I am a marathon runner, having run in many places. I would love to take my 320i Cabriolet for a spin along one of my running routes with the top down, just to feel what it's like to have the wind blowing in your face for 42.195km and see how fast my Beemer can cover the distance! 
shiok!
#opentopshiok

A drive thru England countryside n a stopby at the music festival for a very nice vacay staying in a yurt would be awesome. Where u can meet different kind of people n yet they hv one thing in common that is music. Just like in the movie Bridget Jones Baby...

In my views a good and simpler drive is to Malacca, not too stressful and road is easygoing! You can test the BMW power at the same time once you reach Malacca can park at a hotel take a rest then move to jonker street for food! The next day drive back! But most important is to share how safe you drive not how fast! There is no trophy at the end of the line, safety of everyone in the car and the group is upmost important tasks to complete if such trip is consider.😁😉

A winter road trip in BMW X6 from Geneva to the Swiss Alps would be a dream come true... savor the moment with some wine and cheese at the Alps after a effortless journey in BMW X Drive which promises safety and all terrain capability

My dream is to take the BMW i8 down the Autobahn in Germany, where I can experience the true power of the car. I would begin in Munich where the BMW main plant is, with a tour if that, then drive to Leipzig where the cutting edge i3, i8, and hybrids are manufactured. To be able to see how these cars are manufactured at the origin would be any BMW's fan dream come true!
I would like to go on the road trip with BMW series 5 as well as with my loved one at Florence， Italy and travel around Italy by driving to see the beautiful scenes around this romantic country!!
I would like to go to Penang with my BMW because it will be my first road trip and I had a dream last night that Penang Food is calling out to me !!!!
Driving a X4 in this winter period on the autobahn in Germany heading towards Zugspitz will be awesome - beautiful white scenery on the ultimate driving machine - what more can you ask for
I would like to drive my F10 5 series to Cameron Highlands with my family and to KL for shopping. And feel the turbo power of the BMW. My dream BMW is the new X5...

I would love to drive any bmw model be it a 3 series or 5 series up to Genting highland malaysia. Along the way i can enjoy the scenery and also test the powerful engine of BMW which i believe it can conquered all bends, uphills and downhills roads while on my way up to the highlands.

Even since I first owned a BMW 120 many years ago, I have nvr been able to get use to driving any other cars. The joy and comfort of driving a BMW is something that other cars cannot compared to. I have since owned 2 other BMW including the 5 series now. If I am to go on a road trip, BMW will still be my choice because of the handling and how safe it makes me feel.

I wish to travel up north until border of Thailand with any BMW car with my loved ones. It will be a worthwhile experience. Definitely enjoying and thrilling ride but I love that. Good luck all. Liked and shared this. :)
I would love to go on a road trip to New Zealand covering both North and South islands to relive the wonderful memories of our honeymoon once again but this time with our 3 kids. #BMW

I will take the BMW X6 on a road trip to Iceland, a terrain of unhabitable rocky land covered with glaciers or mosses where only the strongest beast like the X6 can survive. It would be a bonus to marvel at the aurora through the sunroof of X6, while enjoying the company of my loved ones in the warmth and comfort of the luxurious car interior. 😍😁😊
Love to take the BMW Z5 from here to London in road... read about the great scenery and also the challenges of the trip but the road calls me... will have to do this one of these days

Don't own one yet! Has always been an envy. Would love to drive it in Germany, from the city to the country side, along the beautiful autumn trees, farmhouses, lush greenery and the temperate climate! Awesome to take my family of six there, in that beau! BMW!

I would like to drive my BMW SUV over to Leh Laddakh...which is a mountain range border area of Northern India....it presents all different shades of life and one has to struggle to live up to the life unlike other places.....still nature shows vivid creations there which fascinate mind and soul....just like BMW...you have to hard earn it and then you can enjoy its beauty and vivid features...of course, to accompany me would be my beautiful wife and soulful daughter who are like engine to my beautiful and attractive life!!!
